Important Articles.headline: MARA Holdings (NasdaqCM:MARA) experienced a significant share price movement, rising 13% over the last week. This increase came on the heels of MARA Holdings announcing the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP as its new independent registered public accounting firm, succeeding Marcum LLP. Despite the market's modest 1.8% rise during the same period, MARA's performance seems particularly strong, potentially reflecting investor confidence following recent notable earnings growth. Important Articles.headline: Yahoo Finance Anchor Seana Smith outlines what investors need to know mid-trading session in today's Market Minute. Tesla (TSLA) stock tumbles on weak European sales data, sending the electric vehicle (EV) maker's market capitalization below $1 trillion and leading the "Magnificient Seven" into correction territory. At Apple's (AAPL) annual shareholder meeting, investors voted to maintain the iPhone maker's diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives amid political pressure from the Trump administration. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) hit its lowest point in three months, dragging crypto stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Riot (RIOT), and MARA Holdings (MARA) lower. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
Important Articles.title: Tesla, Apple's DEI vote, bitcoin declines: Market Minute

Important Articles.headline: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton examines the top stories on Wall Street as part of today's Market Minute. Home Depot (HD) stock jumps after the company narrowly beat earnings estimates and issued cautious full-year guidance. Hims & Hers (HIMS) shares collapse on the company's confirmation that it would stop selling compounded versions of weight-loss drugs after the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) announced there is no longer a shortage of semaglutide drugs. Crypto-related stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Riot (RIOT), and MARA Holdings (MARA) tumble as bitcoin (BTC-USD) hits its lowest level in three months. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. This post was written by Naomi Buchanan.
Important Articles.title: Home Depot, Hims & Hers, bitcoin and crypto stocks: Market Minute
